F_SPATIAL_OBJECT_GROUND_DISTANCE.question: What is the distance between the center of mass of the <OBJECT> and the ground plane at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_OBJECT_OBJECT_DISTANCE.question: What is the distance between the center of mass of the <OBJECT_1> and the center of mass of the <OBJECT_2> at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_OBJECT_CAMERA_DISTANCE.question: What is the distance between the center of mass of the <OBJECT> and <CAMERA> at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_CLOSEST_OBJECT.question: What is the closest object to <OBJECT> at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_COUNTING_OBJECTS_CLOSE.question: How many objects are closer than <DISTANCE> meters to the camera at time <TIME>?

F_COLLISIONS_OBJ_OBJ.question: With what object is the <OBJECT> colliding first?

F_COLLISIONS_OBJ_OBJ_COUNT_GENERAL.question: How many times is <OBJECT> colliding with other objects?

F_COLLISIONS_OBJ_OBJ_COUNT_TYPE.question: How many times is <OBJECT_1> colliding with <OBJECT_2>?

F_COLLISIONS_OBJ_OBJ_TIME.question: At what time does <OBJECT> collides first?

F_COLLISIONS_OBJ_OBJ_FORCE.question: With what force does <OBJECT_1> collides with <OBJECT_2> the first time?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_SPEED_OBJECT.question: What is the approximate speed of the <OBJECT> at time <TIME> in meters/second?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_MOVEMENT_OBJECT_TYPE.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_TYPE> have moved?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_MOVEMENT_OBJECT_TYPE_T.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_TYPE> are moving at time <TIME>?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_MOVEMENT_UPWARD.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_TYPE> are moving upwards?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_MOVEMENT_METRIC.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_TYPE> moved by more than <DISTANCE> meters from beginning to end?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_STILL.question: How many objects are still during the scene?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_STILL_OBJECT_TYPE.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_TYPE> are still during the scene?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_FASTEST_SPEED.question: What is the approximate speed of the fastest moving object?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_ACCELERATION_OBJECT.question: What is the approximate acceleration of the <OBJECT> in meters/second^2 at time <TIME>?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_ANGULAR_VELOCITY_OBJ.question: What is the approximate angular velocity of the <OBJECT> in rad/s at time <TIME>?
